Package Network

Class Client

  • java.lang.Object
    • Network.Client
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable
    public class Client
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    Client class that makes a client that will send messages to Client Handler that which will handle it appropriate in according to the server

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private boolean active
      a variable of type boolean to check if the game is active
      private Board board
      a variable of type Board to display the board to the local client
      private java.io.BufferedReader buffIn
      a variable of type BufferedReader that will write to the client handler
      private java.io.BufferedWriter buffOut
      a variable of type BufferedWriter that will write what the ClientHandler transmits to client
      private ClientHandler clientHandler
      a variable of the ClientHandler which a client has to communicate with the server
      private java.lang.String name
      a variable of type String which declares the clients name
      private boolean ourTurn
      a variable of type boolean to check weather or not is our move
      private java.net.Socket socket
      a variable of type Socket which the socket that the client puts in to connect to the server
      private java.lang.Thread thread
      a variable of type Thread which will be a separate thread for the client( the run method takes use of the buffered writer to read from ClientHandler)

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Client()
      A constructor for Class client that initializes a client to establish a connection before logging in therefore no name or any other parameter needed here since we adjust it later on

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void close()
      a method that closes the connection between server( closes the socket and stops the thread)
      boolean connect​(java.net.InetAddress address, int port)
      a method that initializes the connection between the server and client
      boolean getActive()
      a getter method that returns whether the client is still active
      Board getBoard()
      a getter method that returns the board
      boolean getOurTurn()
      a getter method that returns if it is our Turn
      void helloClient​(java.lang.String description)
      a method that sends to the server through the set ClientHandler a hello statement to confirm handshake
      void listClient()
      a method that sends to the server through the set ClientHandler a list command that will ask to send back the list of clients in the server
      void loginClient()
      a method that sends to the server through the set ClientHandler a login statement to log in
      void moveClient​(java.lang.String index, java.lang.String rotation)
      a method that sends to the server through the set ClientHandler a move command to send the move of the current player
      void pingClient()
      a method that sends to the server through the set ClientHandler a ping command to check if the connection is still running
      void queueClient()
      a method that sends to the server through the set ClientHandler a queue command to queue the client up to play the game
      void quitClient()
      a method that sends to the server through the set ClientHandler a quit command in order to quit from the server
      void run()
      a run method for the thread to monitor output of the set client handler and act accordingly based on the output from the set client handler
      void setName​(java.lang.String name)
      a setter method that sets the name
      void uknownCommanClient()
      a method that sends to the server through the set ClientHandler an unknown command which will let the server know that the command doesn't exist

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

        a method that sends to the server through the set ClientHandler a move command to send the move of the current player
        Parameters:
        index - the index where the move should be pressed
        rotation - the rotation index of how the board should be rotated
